amendment.description: To establish a National Commission on the Development and Use of Intelligence Related to Iraq.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1882 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 32. Record Vote Number: 395.
Amendment SA 1882 proposed by Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR 10/17/2003 S12718-12721) To establish a National Commission on the Development and Use of Intelligence Related to Iraq.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1882 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 32. Record Vote Number: 395.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1882 proposed by Senator Corzine.
